text: Schizolaena is a genus of trees and shrubs in the family Sarcolaenaceae. They are endemic to Madagascar. == Species == The genus includes the following species: * Schizolaena capuronii * Schizolaena cauliflora * Schizolaena cavacoana * Schizolaena charlotteae * Schizolaena elongata * Schizolaena exinvolucrata * Schizolaena gereaui * Schizolaena hystrix * Schizolaena isaloensis * Schizolaena manomboensis * Schizolaena masoalensis * Schizolaena microphylla * Schizolaena milleri * Schizolaena noronhae * Schizolaena parviflora * Schizolaena parvipetala * Schizolaena pectinata * Schizolaena raymondii * Schizolaena rosea * Schizolaena tampoketsana * Schizolaena turkii * Schizolaena viscosa ==References== Category:Malvales genera
title: Schizolaena
